name: Pocket Snake
description:
Here is the Google Play Store link if you want to play it on your Android device:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.davifoxgames.pocketsnake

On PC:

Controls: Left/Right Arrow keys to control the snake and Space Bar to Pause

Guide the snake to the apples in this game of skill and quick reflexes.
The special apple makes you invincible and faster for a while.
Try not to miss any apples to make combos and increase your score!
